keyMoments.title: Queen Otohime Assassinated
keyMoments.description: The Ryugu Kingdom suffers a devastating blow when Queen Otohime is assassinated at Gyoncorde Plaza, ending her diplomatic efforts for peace between humans and fish-men.
keyMoments.significance: Otohime's death creates a power vacuum and traumatizes the kingdom, shaping Fish-Man Island's politics and society for the next decade.

keyMoments.title: Fukaboshi Vows to Continue Mother's Dream
keyMoments.description: Prince Fukaboshi promises his dying mother that the royal family will continue working toward her dream of peaceful coexistence with humans.
keyMoments.significance: This promise ensures the kingdom doesn't abandon Otohime's ideals and sets the direction for Fukaboshi's future leadership.
